title: New York Fashion Week 2019: Best-dressed celebrities, from Zendaya to Miley Cyrus
text:
New York Fashion Week, the first of the "Big Four" Fashion Weeks, has commenced.

While Fashion Week in the "City That Never Sleeps" officially takes place from Friday 6 September until Saturday 14 September, the proceedings kicked off on the Thursday with several events, including The Daily Front Row's seventh annual Fashion Media Awards.

Stars in attendance at the event included Euphoria star Zendaya, who wore a 1970s-inspired burgundy power suit from her latest collaboration with Tommy Hilfiger.

We’ll tell you what’s true. You can form your own view. From 15p €0.18 $0.18 USD 0.27 a day, more exclusives, analysis and extras.

Meanwhile, actors Katie Holmes and Jamie Chung were photographed on the front row at the runway show for Israeli fashion designer Elie Tahari, both sporting clothing by the creative.

Elsewhere, we've seen countless famous faces taking their seats in the front row this season, with Miley Cyrus in all-black at Tom Ford and Ashley Graham cradling her baby bump at Christian Siriano.

Click through the gallery above to see the best-dressed stars in attendance at this season's New York Fashion Week.
description: New York Fashion Week, the first of the "Big Four" Fashion Weeks, has commenced. While Fashion Week in the "City That Never Sleeps" officially takes place from Friday 6 September until Saturday 14 September, the proceedings kicked off on the Thursday with several events, including The Daily Front Row's seventh annual Fashion Media Awards.
